sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="text-center">
    <v-carousel v-model="activeIndex" hide-delimiters>
      <v-carousel-item v-for="(item, index) in images" :key="index">
        <v-img :src="item.src" :alt="item.alt"></v-img>
      </v-carousel-item>
    </v-carousel>
    <v-row class="small-images">
      <v-col v-for="(item, index) in images" :key="index" cols="auto">
        <v-btn icon :class="{'active': index === activeIndex}" @click="activeIndex = index">
          <v-img :src="item.src" :alt="item.alt" width="50" height="5"></v-img>
        </v-btn>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      activeIndex: 0,
      images: [
        { src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/squirrel.jpg', alt: 'Image 1' },
        { src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/sky.jpg', alt: 'Image 2' },
        { src: 'https://cdn.vuetifyjs.com/images/carousel/bird.jpg', alt: 'Image 3' },
      ],
    };
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.small-images {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-top: 16px;
}

.small-images .v-btn {
  margin-right: 8px;
}

.active .v-btn {
  background-color: blue !important;
}
</style>
